word: We may attain unto glory and virtue, though weak, sinful mortals, by learning daily lessons in the school of Christ, by becoming conformed to the divine image, by manifesting His excellency of character, by adding grace to grace, by climbing round by round the ladder heavenward, by becoming complete in the Beloved.--Letter 43, 1895, pp. 6,8,9. (To Dr. J. H. Kellogg, June 14, 1895.)
